Nostradamus C2Q73

← Back to Search

Old French from 1568

Au lac Fucin de Benac le riuaige

Prins du Léman au port de l’Orguion:

Nay de trois bras prédict belliq image,

Par trois couronnes au grand Endymion.

Modern English

At the lake Fucin of Benac the riuaige,

Prince of Léman at the port of Orguion:

Not of three arms predicts warlike image,

By three crowns to the great Endymion.

Interpretation

Near Lake Fucin (Lake Garda) a leader from Léman will appear at the port of Orguion. A three‑armed symbol foretells war, and three crowns will be placed upon Endymion (a figure of authority), indicating a coalition of three states preparing for conflict around northern Italy.
